name: Riolu
description: The Emanation Pokémon. The aura that emanates from its body intensifies to alert others if it is afraid or sad.

abilities.name: Steadfast
abilities.description: Once per long rest, when this Pokémon fails a saving throw against a negative condition, it can choose to pass instead.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to flinching.

abilities.name: Prankster
abilities.description: Once per short rest, this Pokémon can move to the top of initiative order in a single round, but must use a status-affecting move on its turn.
